entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 07:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
